articles.author: anuragchawake
articles.title: Motorola to Infinix: Top 5 phones you can buy under Rs 10,000 - The Indian Express
articles.description: From the Motorola E13 to the Infinix Note 12i, here are some of the best smartphones you can buy under Rs 10,000
articles.content: Powered by the Unisoc T606 chipset, the Motorola E13 is another great budget phone to look out for. It has a 6.5-inch screen, 13MP rear camera and starts from Rs 6,999.
